$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryToggleMenu.title: $:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryToggleMenu
$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryToggleMenu.text:
<$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="nomatch" text="no" default="no"> <$button set="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" setTo="no" tooltip="Hide right column" aria-label="" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> hide right column
<$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="match" text="no" default="no"> <$button set="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" setTo="yes" tooltip="Show right column" aria-label="" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-btn-storytwotoggle"> show right column

$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryTogglePage.title: $:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryTogglePageControl
$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryTogglePage.caption: {{$:/xp/images/2column}} Show right column

$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryTogglePage.text: \whitespace trim <$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="nomatch" text="no" default="no"> <$button set="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" setTo="no" tooltip="Hide right column" aria-label="" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/1column}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="hide right column"/> <$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="match" text="no" default="no"> <$button set="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" setTo="yes" tooltip="Show right column" aria-label="" class=<>> <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> {{$:/xp/images/2column}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="show right column"/>

$:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerEditMacro.title: $:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerEditMacro

$:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerEditMacro.text: \define divertTiddlerEditButton() \whitespace trim <$set name="original" value={{!!draft.title}}> <$set name="otherStoryList" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$set name="otherHistoryList" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/HistoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$button class=<> tooltip="Divert this tiddler to the other story for viewing"> <$navigator story=<> history=<> > <$action-navigate $to=<> /> {{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-right.svg}}{{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-left.svg}} \end <>

$:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerMacro.text: \whitespace trim <$set name="otherStoryList" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$set name="otherHistoryList" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/HistoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$button class=<> tooltip="Divert this tiddler to the other story"> <$navigator story=<> history=<> > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" $param=<> /> <$navigator story=<> history=<> > <$action-navigate $to=<> /> {{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-right.svg}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="divert"/> {{$:/_sq/Stories/icons/divert-left.svg}} <$list filter="[match[yes]]"> <$text text="divert"/>

$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/RiverDropZone.title: $:/_sq/Stories/Templates/RiverDropZone
$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/RiverDropZone.text:
\define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[remove]"/> <$action-navigate $to=<>/> \end <$reveal state="$:/_sq/Stories/config/showRiverDropZones" text="enable" type="match" default="disable">
<$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/Buttons/new-tiddler"/>
<$set name="otherStoryList" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$droppable actions=<>>
 
Drop link here to open

$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/Story2Template.title: $:/_sq/Stories/Templates/Story2Template
$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/Story2Template.text:
\whitespace trim <$reveal state="$:/config/_sq/Stories/story2" type="match" text="yes" default="no" retain="yes" animate="no" tag="section" class="tc-story-river tc-storytwo-river sq-story-rivertwo"> <$navigator story="$:/_sq/Stories/Story2StoryList" history="$:/_sq/Stories/Story2HistoryList" openLinkFromInsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromInsideRiver}} openLinkFromOutsideRiver={{$:/config/Navigation/openLinkFromOutsideRiver}} relinkOnRename={{$:/config/RelinkOnRename}}> <$scrollable class="sq-story-rivertwo-scrollable" fallthrough="no">
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/AboveStory]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude/>
<$list filter="[list[$:/_sq/Stories/Story2StoryList]]" history="$:/_sq/Stories/Story2HistoryList" template={{{[[$:/config/sq/Stories/story2/ViewTemplate]get[text]!is[blank]] ~[[$:/config/ui/ViewTemplate]get[text]]}}} editTemplate={{{[[$:/config/sq/Stories/story2/EditTemplate]get[text]!is[blank]] ~[[$:/config/ui/EditTemplate]get[text]]}}} storyview={{$:/_sq/Stories/config/Story2-storyview}}>
<$transclude/>
<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/BelowStory]!has[draft.of]]"> <$transclude/>

$:/_sq/Stories/config/snippets/viewswitc.title: $:/_sq/Stories/config/snippets/viewswitcher
$:/_sq/Stories/config/snippets/viewswitc.text:
\define icon() $:/core/images/storyview-$(storyview)$ \end <$linkcatcher to="$:/_sq/Stories/config/Story2-storyview">
<$list filter="[storyviews[]]" variable="storyview"> <$set name="cls" filter="[prefix{$:/_sq/Stories/config/Story2-storyview}]" value="tc-chooser-item tc-chosen" emptyValue="tc-chooser-item">
>> <$link to=<>> <$transclude tiddler=<>/> <$text text=<>/>

$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open.title: $:/core/ui/SideBar/Open
$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open.caption: {{$:/language/SideBar/Open/Caption}}
$:/core/ui/SideBar/Open.text:
\whitespace trim \import $:/xp/LeftOpenTab/macros/title \define lingo-base() $:/language/CloseAll/ \define drop-actions() <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[insertbefore:currentTiddler]"/> <$action-listops $tiddler=<<_otherStory>> $subfilter="-[]"/> \end \define placeholder()
\end \define droppable-item(button) \whitespace trim <$droppable actions=<>> <>
$button$
\end \define open-tiddler-list()
<$list filter="[list]" history=<> storyview="pop">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="""<$button message="tm-close-tiddler" tooltip={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Hint}} aria-label={{$:/language/Buttons/Close/Caption}} class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini">{{$:/core/images/close-button}} <>"""/>
<$tiddler tiddler="">
<$macrocall $name="droppable-item" button="""<$button message="tm-close-all-tiddlers" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"><>"""/>
\end <$set name="_otherStory" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <>
Right Column <$set name="_otherStory" value=<> > <$set name="tv-story-list" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/StoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$set name="tv-history-list" filter="[enlist{$:/_sq/Stories/HistoriesList!!list}] -[]" select="0"> <$navigator story=<> history=<> > <>
<$transclude tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/Templates/StoryToggleMenu"/>

$:/plugins/sq/Stories/changelog.title: $:/plugins/sq/Stories/changelog
$:/plugins/sq/Stories/changelog.text:
Version 1.03

* Fixed bug in view toolbar position caused by extra blank line in $:/_sq/Stories/divertTiddlerMacro

Version 1.0.2

* Fixed bug where storyRiverRatio was not respected at some resolutions

Version 1.0.1

* Added support for config tiddlers to customize view and edit templates for second story. These tiddlers override the core config tiddlers if they exist.
** $:/config/sq/Stories/story2/EditTemplate
** $:/config/sq/Stories/story2/ViewTemplate
* Relative width of each story river can now be customized in settings tab for plugin
** introduced $:/config/sq/Stories/storyRiverRatio and updated Stories.css accordingly

Version 1.0.0

* 29/07: updated $:/_sq/Stories/EditTiddlerHook to try and fix https://github.com/felixhayashi/TW5-TiddlyMap/issues/357
* 23/05 : tweaked Stories.css based on personal theme to allow easier adjustment of story width
* 23/05 : deprecated action-addtohistory widget
* 23/05 : updated divertTiddlerEditMacro to use navigator widgets
* 23/05 : updated divertTiddlerMacro to use navigator widgets
* 30/04 : updated divertTiddlerEditMacro to also update history and avoid issues with zoomin storyview

$:/plugins/sq/Stories/settings.title: $:/plugins/sq/Stories/settings
$:/plugins/sq/Stories/settings.caption: Two Story Layout
$:/plugins/sq/Stories/settings.text:
\define switchStoryView(storyview,default)
<$select tiddler='$storyview$' default='$default$'>
<option value="zoomin"><$text text='one tiddler only'/></option>
<option value="classic"><$text text='multiple tiddlers'/></option>
</$select>
\end

|[[Minimum width to show the second story|$:/_sq/Stories/config/twostorybreakpoint]] |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/config/twostorybreakpoint" default="" tag="input"/> |
|[[Minimum width to show non-overlapping sidebar|$:/_sq/Stories/config/sidebaroverlaybreakpoint]] |<$edit-text tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/config/sidebaroverlaybreakpoint" default="" tag="input"/> |
|[[Open tiddlers at top or bottom of story when using divert button|$:/_sq/Stories/config/openLinkDivert]] | <$select tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/config/openLinkDivert" default="bottom"><option value="top">top</option><option value="bottom">bottom</option></$select>|
|<$link to="$:/_sq/Stories/config/showRiverDropZones">Show dropzones above each story</$link>|<$checkbox tiddler="$:/_sq/Stories/config/showRiverDropZones" field="text" checked="enable" unchecked="disable" default="disable"></$checkbox>|
|[[Story view for second story|$:/_sq/Stories/config/Story2-storyview]]:|{{$:/_sq/Stories/config/snippets/viewswitcher}}|



''Choose how to view tiddlers in each column''

Left column: <<switchStoryView $:/view zoomin>>

Right column: <<switchStoryView $:/_sq/Stories/config/Story2-storyview classic>>

''Left column to right column width ratio:''

{{$:/config/sq/Stories/storyRiverRatio}} : <$text text={{{[[100]subtract{$:/config/sq/Stories/storyRiverRatio}]}}}/>

<$range tiddler="$:/config/sq/Stories/storyRiverRatio" min="20" max="80" default="50" increment="5"/> 
<!--
''Right column font-size''

Tiddler: {{$:/config/sq/Stories/story2/fontsize-title}}px

<$range tiddler="$:/config/sq/Stories/story2/fontsize-title" min="6" max="40" default="14" increment="1"/> 

Body: {{$:/config/sq/Stories/story2/fontsize-body}}px

<$range tiddler="$:/config/sq/Stories/story2/fontsize-body" min="6" max="40" default="15" increment="1"/> 

-->
